statements: SELECT * FROM abandoned_carts;
SELECT user_id, abandoned_at FROM abandoned_carts WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT cart_id, items FROM abandoned_carts ORDER BY abandoned_at DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM abandoned_carts WHERE abandoned_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS num_abandoned_carts FROM abandoned_carts GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM abandoned_carts WHERE user_id = 123456 ORDER BY abandoned_at DESC;
SELECT cart_id, user_id, abandoned_at FROM abandoned_carts WHERE abandoned_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM abandoned_carts WHERE cart_id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000');
SELECT * FROM abandoned_carts WHERE JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(items) > 3 AND abandoned_at > '2022-06-30' ORDER BY user_id, abandoned_at DESC;
SELECT cart_id, user_id FROM abandoned_carts WHERE abandoned_at < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - INTERVAL '1 week';
SELECT * FROM abandoned_carts
SELECT customer_id, total_amount FROM abandoned_carts WHERE cart_id = 123
SELECT strategy_name, target_audience FROM remarketing_strategies WHERE strategy_id = 1
SELECT cart_id, created_at FROM abandoned_carts ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name FROM remarketing_strategies WHERE strategy_description LIKE '%engagement%'
SELECT * FROM abandoned_carts WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT strategy_name, target_audience FROM remarketing_strategies WHERE strategy_id = 5;
SELECT cart_id, total_amount FROM abandoned_carts WHERE total_amount > 100.00 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM remarketing_strategies WHERE LENGTH(strategy_description) > 500;
SELECT AVG(total_amount) AS average_amount FROM abandoned_carts;
SELECT * FROM abandoned_carts;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, quantity, timestamp FROM abandoned_carts;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_details WHERE phone_number = '+123456789';
SELECT strategy_name, start_date, end_date FROM remarketing_strategies WHERE strategy_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM abandoned_carts WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM abandoned_carts ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, quantity FROM abandoned_carts WHERE customer_id = 'c01b4ea3-910f-4b7a-9b94-81e40c0fade7';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_details WHERE last_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT strategy_name, description FROM remarketing_strategies WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT SUM(quantity), product_id FROM abandoned_carts GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY SUM(quantity) DESC;
SELECT * FROM AbandonedCarts;
SELECT cart_id, abandoned_at FROM AbandonedCarts ORDER BY abandoned_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM CartItems WHERE cart_id = 1001;
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users WHERE username LIKE 'john%';
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_description FROM RemarketingStrategies WHERE user_id = 5001 ORDER BY strategy_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT item_name, price FROM CartItems WHERE cart_id = 123 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_carts FROM AbandonedCarts GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_carts > 2;
SELECT * FROM RemarketingStrategies WHERE strategy_description LIKE '%remarketing%'
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT * FROM abandoned_carts ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(cart_id) AS cart_count FROM abandoned_carts GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM abandoned_carts WHERE customer_id = 101 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM abandoned_carts) LIMIT 5;
SELECT strategy_name, description FROM remarketing_strategies WHERE LENGTH(description) > 100 ORDER BY strategy_name;

SELECT a.cart_id, p.product_name, ci.quantity FROM abandoned_carts a JOIN cart_items ci ON a.cart_id = ci.cart_id JOIN products p ON ci.product_id = p.product_id WHERE ci.quantity > 1 ORDER BY a.timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
